titleStmt.title: The Iesuits character. Or, A description of the wonderfull birth, wicked life, and wretched death, of a Jesuite. A discovery, on purpose made unto this end, that all men knowing him by this description might beware of him, as of one which is the most subtill, obstinate, cruell, counterfeit, ambitious, vitious, treacherous, and rebellious person in the world.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
